name.description:
Name for the image. The name of an image is not unique to an Image
service node. The API cannot expect users to know the names of
images owned by others.

container_format.description:
Format of the container. A valid value is ``ami`` , ``ari`` ,
``aki`` , ``bare`` , ``ovf`` , or ``ova`` .

min_ram.description: Amount of RAM in MB that is required to boot the image.

disk_format.description:
Format of the disk. A valid value is ``ami`` , ``ari`` , ``aki`` ,
``vhd`` , ``vmdk`` , ``raw`` , ``qcow2`` , ``vdi`` , or ``iso`` .

visibility.description: Image visibility. Public or private. Default is public.

properties.description: Properties, if any, that are associated with the image.

protected.description: If true, image is not deletable.

min_disk.description: Amount of disk space in GB that is required to boot the image.
